TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StyleSheetLocation extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of location for the style sheet for a mobile control or page. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation> enumeration is used by classes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters> namespace to facilitate creating XHTML markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation ApplicationCache = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The style sheet is stored in the Application Cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation Internal = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The style sheet is a set of styles within the current source file (either .aspx or .ascx).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation None = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation NotSet = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Default value. The location has not yet been determined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation PhysicalFile = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The style sheet is an external physical file, such as MyStylesheet.css.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.StyleSheetLocation SessionState = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The style sheet is stored in the current Session state.
